languages.text: {n}Заметив подле вас ткача Кровавой паутины, чета Эрэбис переглядывается. Едва уловимое напряжение повисает в воздухе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Заметив подле вас культистку смерти, чета Эрэбис странно переглядывается. Едва уловимое напряжение повисает в воздухе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив подле вас ткача Кровавой паутины, чета Эрэбис переглядывается. Едва уловимое напряжение повисает в воздухе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Erebises notice a Bloodspun Web weaver at your side, and exchange glances. There's an almost imperceptible tension in the air.{/n}
{n}The Erebises notice a Bloodspun Web weaver at your side, and exchange glances. There's an almost imperceptible tension in the air.{/n}

{n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}
{n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tension devient subitement palpable lorsque les parents Erebis remarquent la présence d'une cultiste de la Toile de Sang à vos côtés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tension devient subitement palpable lorsque les parents Erebis remarquent la présence d'une cultiste de la Toile de Sang à vos côtés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando los padres Erebis ven a una cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta a tu lado, se miran entre ellos. En el aire hay una tensión casi imperceptible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando los padres Erebis ven a una cultista de la Red Sanguinolenta a tu lado, se miran entre ellos. En el aire hay una tensión casi imperceptible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エレビス家の両親は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者がこちらの近くにいることに気づいて顔を見合わせる。うっすらと緊張感が漂った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エレビス家の両親は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの信者がこちらの近くにいることに気づいて顔を見合わせる。うっすらと緊張感が漂った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当伊雷比斯家族的两位家长注意到你身边的织血罗网教派成员时，他们彼此互视一眼。空气中弥漫着几乎无法觉察的紧张气氛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当伊雷比斯家族的两位家长注意到你身边的织血罗网教派成员时，他们彼此互视一眼。空气中弥漫着几乎无法觉察的紧张气氛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als die Eltern Erebis eine Kultistin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes an deiner Seite bemerken, tauschen sie einen Blick aus. Eine kaum wahrnehmbare Anspannung hängt in der Luft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die Eltern Erebis eine Kultistin des Blutgesponnenen Netzes an deiner Seite bemerken, tauschen sie einen Blick aus. Eine kaum wahrnehmbare Anspannung hängt in der Luft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anne ve baba Erebis, yanında bir Kanipi Ağı tarikatçısı durduğunu fark etmeleriyle birlikte birbirlerine bakıyor. Havaya zar zor algılanan bir gerginlik hâkim.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As the Erebis parents notice a Bloodspun Web cultist at your side, they exchange glances. An almost imperceptible tension hangs in the air.{/n}
